Description:
Stunning from start to finish.
Welcome to the absolute best Corio has to offer. Be captivated as you enter into this stunning property, you will be in awe of every detail the home owners have worked tirelessly to perfect. As you walk through the magnificent hallway you are greeted on the right to the large master bedroom which features a walk in robe and ensuite. On the left there is a bedroom which could also be used as a study. Further on is a third bedroom and the first of two living areas.
The large, bright open plan living/dining and kitchen is spectacular, the modern updated kitchen has been tastefully finished with quality appliances, gas stove top, dishwasher, stone bench tops providing ample storage and of course the breakfast bench perfect for the kids. Indulge in looking over the outdoor kitchenette/entertaining area through the multiple windows seamlessly adjoining the inside to outside. This beautifully finished alfresco features so much space and warmth for all kinds of entertaining from kids parties to Christmas gatherings.
A further two bedrooms with built in robes at the rear of the home are serviced by the main bathroom which features a full bath, shower and generous vanity. Separate toilet and laundry complete the layout of this home.
Outside there's so much space for almost any activity or game, side access for a caravan or boat to be stored, a double remote garage and it's all low maintenance.
Other features include cosy ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Insights: 2-4 McCubbin Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Attention First Home Buyers/Investors"
Set within a couple of minutes of the Geelong Ring Rd for quick and easy commuting to Melbourne/Geelong is this family home within walking distance to all major amenities. With public transport at your doorstep, make this your first home or add to your investment portfolio. Boasting 3 good-sized bedrooms, central living area, heating and cooling & a double garage. Priced to sell and with nothing to do but move in and unpack - this will not last long!
-3 Bedrooms
-Double Garage
-Close to Schools
-Close to Shops
-Close to Public Transport
-Close to Medical Facilities
-Close to Geelong Ring Rd for Commuting
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
A true family home
Spacious, modern and immaculately presented, this stylish home offers everything a growing family could need. There's room to move and play, plus space to entertain, indulge & relax in a quiet escape. The open, flowing floorplan of the home creates a sense of space but also separation where you can enjoy some quiet time. Set at the front of the home the formal lounge is bathed in light from the north facing windows. At the heart of the home is the well thought out kitchen with ample space, large island bench and breakfast bar, finished off with a five burner gas stove, electric oven, dishwasher and generous pantry. The kitchen overlooks the second living area and dining space, then out to the covered alfresco ensuring an abundance of indoor/outdoor living that will have you entertaining family and friends. All three bedrooms are set to the rear of the home, including the master bedroom with its own walk-in robe and ensuite, while the two guest bedrooms both have built-in robes and are serviced by main bathroom. The backyard offers plenty of space for the kids or pets to play and side access creates space to store a boat or caravan. This move in ready home is packed with upgrades and extra features including ducted heating, split system air conditioning, a double garage with internal access, alarm system, external shutters, a water tank and solar panels. You will love living close to schools, shops and public transport, while easy access to the Geelong Ring Road will have you out and exploring the region or heading off to Melbourne or down the coast in no time.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 41 Nigella Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern and stylish family home
Beautifully renovated throughout, this gorgeous home perfectly blends charm & homeliness with contemporary style. Immaculately presented with a huge backyard, this home is perfect for first-time buyers, young families and investors.There are three good-sized bedrooms, two with built-in robes and all with access to the updated central bathroom with a full bath and separate shower. The kitchen is a home chef's dream come true, complete with an induction stove top, electric oven, dishwasher, plenty of bench space and lots of natural light.The kitchen is open to the dining space, while at the front of the home, the light-filled lounge room with air-conditioning gives you year-round comfort. Polished timber floors flow throughout, along with a soft grey colour palette and stylish white trim.The 759sqm block provides a great-sized backyard with plenty of space for the kids to run free. There is a sunny rear patio, beautiful mature trees that provide lovely shade in summer, a grassed area, plus plenty of shedding for the DIY enthusiast and off-street parking.You will love living close to schools, shops and public transport, while easy access to the freeway will have you in Melbourne in no time.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 2 Macedon Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Exciting home or development opportunity
Whether you're an experienced developer, savvy investor or first-time buyer, this centrally-located home is absolutely bursting with potential. Set on a 695sqm easement-free block within high density zoning, you really will be spoilt for choice when it comes to this property.You could enjoy this light-filled three-bedroom, one-bathroom home as is. The kitchen and bathroom have had updates and with the charming period features including ceiling rosettes, ornate crown mouldings and timber floorboards or you could further add value with some simple renovation works.All the bedrooms are a great size and the large living room set to the front of the home is complete with gas heating and air-conditioning. Families will love the huge yard and ample off-street parking while 5.8m x 9.7m shed will appeal to the DIY enthusiast.There are options to retain the existing house, develop the backyard or start fresh with a multi-lot development (STCA). This, as well as the property's 16m frontage and central and convenient location, is a terrific opportunity to invest.Positioned within walking distance to schools, Corio Village shopping centre and public transport links, the appeal to any future owner or renter is enhanced. You can be in Geelong in only 10 minutes or on the Ring Road to Melbourne in just a couple of turns.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 25 Talpa Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
First Home Buyers or Developers - 660m2
This affordable 3 bedroom property in Corio would be perfect for first home buyers, developers or investors. Set on a good size block, this original home is ready for you to move in and renovate if you choose, or rent straight out. There is plenty of off street parking available with a single garage (powered and concreted) and carport, and room for extra vehicles. Low maintenance front garden and smaller shedding in the large backyard. Walk to Corio Village, Shell Club or public transport. Estimated rental return $300 per week.

Description:
This won't last long.
Time to get into the property market or add to the property investment portfolio. This well presented 3 bedroom home is in a great location within minutes to Corio Village Shopping Centre and close to schools, medical facilities, public transport and handy to everything, it's a great place to start. Comprising of a light filled comfortable living area with reverse cycle heating/cooling, open plan kitchen & meals area including gas cooking & pantry. Complete with 3 good sized bedrooms, two with built in robes, main with ceiling fan, updated bathroom, undercover decking for entertaining all year round, small shed & double gate access to the fully enclosed allotment of (approx.) 540m2. This property will be snapped up quick.

Great value.
Within walking distance to schools, shops, medical facilities and public transport at your doorstep, the central location is just one of the positive features of this home.

Description:
"VENDOR SAYS SELL!!!"
With a price like this, you will never find a better opportunity to secure a brilliant first home or investment right in the heart of Corio. Comprising of 3 bedrooms all with BIRs, fully renovated bathroom, central kitchen and large living room with heating and cooling. Set on an extra large 616sqm block (approx.) with potential to subdivide (STCA), with a double garage and rear access. Located in a quiet court with schools, shops & medical facilities nearby plus public transport at your doorstep.
-Large 616sqm Block (Approx.)
-3 Good-Sized Bedrooms
-2 Car Garage & Ample Off-street Parking
-Air Conditioning & Heating

Description:
Family Entertainer with Extra Garaging
This quality built family home located in the Sought after Rosepark Estate offers spacious living on a large 606m2 (approx allotment). This home offers a comfortable, convenient & quiet living in a popular street.
This bright family home offers a well thought out floor plan consisting of 3 bedrooms with walk in robe & ensuite to complete the master, additional bedrooms offer built in robes.
2 Separate living areas with open plan living offering decent proportions for the modern family. Kitchen showcases ample bench space with modern appliances.
Large rear yard and alfresco with shade sails for the entertainers. This home is perfect for the growing family. Extra garaging is assured and gives you plenty of room with the shed measuring 6.5m X 10m (approx.) perfect for all the toys or extra cars.
Within walking distance to schools & parks, just a short drive to the Corio Shopping center, kindergartens & major amenities. Commuters, feel at ease with access to the ring road within a 3-minute drive.

Description:
Opportunity knocks!
If you've been looking for a property you can easily add value to and then sit back and enjoy a great rental return - this is it! Roll your sleeves up for a few weekends, finish a few odds and ends and you'll be away.

Year-round comfort is provided by 2 split systems, ceiling fans and HRV ventilation system.
Positioned in a private court, you'll enjoy being moments to schools, Corio Village, public transport and the ring road.

Description:
Renovated, Family Entertainer
On a sizeable allotment of approx 639sqm, and directly opposite Hendy Street Reserve, space is no concern with this property. Public transport at your fingertips running along both Hendy Street & Plantation Roads, very easy access to the Ring Road, Melbourne is under an hour away and Geelongs CBD just 15 minutes! Surrounded by local schools including Northern Bay College & St Francis Xavier, pre-schools and Early Learning Centres an easy 10 minute walk. Corio Shopping Centre, Geelong Gate Homemaker Centre & Aldi all within a 5 minute drive.
- 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, all with ceiling fans & external roller shutters
- Fully renovated family bathroom with bath shower & vanity and separate toilet
- Updated kitchen with stainless steel gas cooking & abundance of storage space
- Large light filled living area with split system A/C & electric roller shutter
- Entertaining deck looking over the large backyard with garden shed
- Double lock up garage with gated storage area behind
- Side gated access perfect for trailers/caravans/boats/extra cars etc
- Ducted heating throughout
- Large 639sqm (approx.) block with wide side driveway access
Dont miss out on this immaculate home, inspect today!

Description:
Perfect location.
This much loved family home is presenting a wonderful opportunity on a generous 604m2 (approx.) block. Located in a blue chip position sits this well maintained, immaculate three bedroom (with built in robes) plus bungalow home. With excellent natural light and a mix of polished timber and carpeted floors, it has so much potential to add some modern inspiration with a renovation, or future development (STCA).
The existing home offers a spacious lounge, complete with heating, air conditioning and ceiling fans. The kitchen features a family meals area and ample cupboard space. The home is further enhanced by a separate two car garage, with an attached storage space, carports and garden shed located at the rear. The generous floorplan has a separate living zone in the undercover outdoor alfresco area perfect for the family to enjoy together or privately which is overlooking the large rear garden.
A superior location with easy access to local schools, parks and reserves, Corio shopping centre and to the Princes Highway. Ideal for first home buyers, families or investors alike, you won't be disappointed!

Description:
Room to Grow!
Situated on a prominent corner allotment, this owner-occupied family home represents a great investment opportunity. Discerning buyers will appreciate its wonderful proximity to shops, schools, medical clinics and public transport.
With its classic blend of vintage charm and contemporary functionality, this single-storey property boasts high ceilings and polished floors. A large lounge/living room with gas heater and functional L-shaped kitchen with upright gas stove and meals area are enhanced by two split system inverters for year-round comfort.
Two robed bedrooms are supplemented by dado-panelled family bathroom with shower and large vanity featuring under-mount sink. Outside, a generously-proportioned backyard incorporates fabulous undercover entertainment area, while single garage and enclosed double carport complete this home.

Description:
Exceptional home, exceptional value.
Set amongst established gardens on a 629m2 (approx.) block and within walking distance to schools, shops, medical facilities and public transport at your doorstep, the central location is just one of the positive features of this home. This fabulous home is really well presented boasting three good-sized bedrooms, two with built in robes. The bright, updated & light-filled kitchen/dining area offers ample cupboard and benchspace, gas cooking, dishwasher and still enough room for the dining table to fit comfortably. Moving into the large L-shaped lounge/study area you will find wood fire heating, split system heating/cooling, gas heating, and built in storage in the study area. Other features include a spacious laundry with cupboard and benchspace plus bathroom with bath and separate shower. Outside leads to the undercover pergola for all-year-round entertaining plus a fully functional bungalow perfect for a fourth bedroom, teenager, man cave or the in-laws, large storage shed for that extra convenience, solar panels and enough room for all the family in the fully enclosed yard.

Description:
Neat As A Pin Just Move In!
For those seeking a quiet, comfortable and convenient lifestyle where your investment is assured there is no need to look further than 7 Fiona Avenue Corio. Presenting a delightful light filled residence ideal for first home buyers, young families or investors seeking massive growth.
In immaculate condition this home consists of three bedrooms, central bathroom, open plan kitchen, dinning and lounge room. Features include gas heating & cooling, pizza oven, dishwasher, gas top cooking, electric oven, four car garage with workshop area and single carport. All positioned on approx. 613m2 with a north facing rear yard.
Within easy reach to all of Corio's best facilities and services, including great shopping, medical centers, Schools and the Shell reserve. This property truly is great buying in today's market with so much to offer.
Insights: 7 Fiona Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxury living in a sought after location.
Introducing this fully renovated three bedroom home situated on a 537m2 (approx.) block with seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining, set in stunningly manicured gardens.
The home comprises of a spacious light filled lounge area as well as 3 generous bedrooms (one with BIR) and an impressive central bathroom which has been beautifully updated. The large kitchen area meets the most demanding of needs coming complete with a dishwasher and ample bench space overlooking the rear yard.
Step outside into your own private outdoor alfresco area perfect for entertaining family or friends. Offering additional extras such as air conditioning, spa bath, garden shed, bbq area and much more, this home has been renovated to ensure a comfortable and easy lifestyle.
Located in a sought after neighbourhood surrounded by multiple reserves and all major amenities within easy reach. Close by to local schools, Corio Shopping Centre and the Princes Highway for commuters, what more could you ask for?
Don't hesitate, secure this remarkable family home today.
Insights: 64 Vermont Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Land with approved Permit for Units
Reliance Real Estate is proud to present this block of land in Corio

At 410sqm (approx) , this is the perfect opportunity for builders and Investors to build 2 x 2 bedroom units.

Description:
A Home To Make Your Own
On a large 637sqm (approx.) block, this quiet street is surrounded by everything that the northern suburbs have to offer, a short walk to Corio Central Shopping Centre, Northern Bay College Hendy & Wexford Campuses, St Francis Xavier Primary, and many public transport options. Access to the Ring Road is only minutes away bringing Melbourne's CBD within an hour & Geelong CBD an easy 15 minutes!
Large sunlit lounge with polished floorboards, wall A/C & ceiling fan
Adjoining kitchen/meals area with gas, stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher, abundance of storage & feature bay window
3 good sized bedrooms with polished floorboards, all with mirrored built in robes and ceiling fans
Secure carport with electric remote roller door
Large, paved undercover entertaining alfresco
Spacious backyard with combination of large grassed area & fernery
Rear man-cave/bungalow lined with power and Coonara heater
Ducted heating throughout
Huge 637sqm block & sprinkler system in front yard
External roller shutters on all meals/living/bedroom windows
Potential rent return of $310-$330 per week
A great opportunity for a first home buyer to make their own or an investor to enjoy a steady return.
Insights: 16 Atami Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
